articles.title: Zohran Mamdani and Democratic Socialists prepare for complicated partnership - Politico
articles.description: The frontrunner and the Democratic Socialists of America are entering uncharted political territory.
articles.content: One of two things will happen: They will give him a grace period and let him get his sea legs and recognize that compromise is a way to get something done, or they become one of his biggest obstacles… [+9177 chars]

articles.title: Trump says he wants to resume nuclear testing. Here's what that would mean - NPR
articles.description: The U.S. has not conducted a nuclear test in over 30 years. Experts say doing one now could make America less safe.
articles.content:
President Trump said on Thursday that the U.S. would begin testing nuclear weapons again for the first time in decades.
"We've halted many years ago, but with others doing testing I think it's appro… [+5564 chars]

articles.author: Taylor Nicioli
articles.title: Certain species of bats can glow under UV light. Scientists don’t know why - CNN
articles.description: Six species of North American bats glow under ultraviolet lighting, according to a new study. Researchers don’t know why certain mammals exhibit this odd trait.
articles.content:
Glowing bats may sound like Halloween decor, but researchers in Georgia have discovered certain species of North American bats that are capable of the unusual trick.
